ModMetaData.name: [sd] conduit wall
ModMetaData.author: sulusdacor
ModMetaData.description:
"conduit wall"
adds a conduit wall. nothing else.
- linked to vanilla electricity research - increased work to make from 150 to 185 - cost same as normal + 1 steel (wall + conduuit) - rest stats same as the normal walls
Download links for Dropbox (current or older versions) or Steamworkshop link for current Rimworld version can be found in the ludeon forum thread linked above.
